workflow.name: Create a WhatsApp chatbot with GPT-4o, Whisper transcription and Redis buffer
workflow.description:
üë• Who's it for
This workflow is perfect for businesses or individuals who want to automate WhatsApp conversations üí¨ with an intelligent AI chatbot that can handle text, voice notes üéµ, and images üñºÔ∏è. No advanced coding required!
ü§ñ What it does
It automatically receives WhatsApp messages through WasenderAPI, intelligently buffers consecutive messages to avoid fragmented responses, processes multimedia content (transcribing audio and analyzing images with AI), and responds naturally using GPT-4o mini with conversation memory. All while protecting your WhatsApp account from being banned.
‚öôÔ∏è How it works

üì± Webhook Trigger ‚Äì Receives new messages from WasenderAPI
üóÉÔ∏è Redis Buffer System ‚Äì Groups consecutive messages intelligently (7-second window)
üîÄ Content Classifier ‚Äì Routes messages by type (text, audio, or image)
üéµ Audio Processing ‚Äì Decrypts and transcribes voice notes using OpenAI Whisper
üñºÔ∏è Image Analysis ‚Äì Decrypts and analyzes images with GPT-4O Vision
üß† AI Agent (GPT-4o mini) ‚Äì Generates intelligent responses with 10-message memory
‚è±Ô∏è Anti-Ban Wait ‚Äì 6-second delay to simulate human typing
üì§ Message Sender ‚Äì Delivers response back to WhatsApp user

üìã Requirements

WasenderAPI account with connected WhatsApp number : https://wasenderapi.com/

Redis database (free tier works fine)
OpenAI API key with access to GPT-4o mini and Whisper
n8n's AI Agent, LangChain, and Redis nodes

üõ†Ô∏è How to set up

Create your WasenderAPI account and connect a WhatsApp number
Set up a free Redis database and get connection credentials
Configure OpenAI API key in n8n credentials
Replace the WasenderAPI Bearer token in "Get the audio", "Get the photo", and "Send Message to User" nodes
Change the Manual Trigger to a Webhook and configure it in WasenderAPI
Customize the AI Agent prompt to match your business needs
Adjust wait times if needed (default: 6 seconds for responses, 7 seconds for buffer)
Save and activate the workflow ‚úÖ

üé® How to customize

Modify the AI Agent prompt to change bot personality and instructions
Adjust buffer wait time (7 seconds) for faster/slower message grouping
Change response delay (6 seconds) based on your use case , its recomendable 30 seconds.
Add more content types (documents, videos) by extending the Switch Type node
Configure conversation memory window (default: 10 messages)

assignments.name: =Image
assignments.value:
=Caption written by User: {{ $('Code in JavaScript').item.json.content }}

Image analysis: {{ $json.content }}

parameters.messageData:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  message_id: $('Set fields1').item.json.message.message_id,
  chat_id: $('Set fields1').item.json.message.chat_id,
  content_type: $('Set fields1').item.json.message.content_type,
  content: $('Set fields1').item.json.message.content,
  timestamp: $('Set fields1').item.json.message.timestamp,
  url: $('Set fields1').item.json.url,
  mimetype: $('Set fields1').item.json.mimetype,
  mediaKey: $('Set fields1').item.json.mediaKey,
  fileSha256: $('Set fields1').item.json.fileSha256,
  fileLength: $('Set fields1').item.json.fileLength,
  jpegThumbnail: $('Set fields1').item.json.jpegThumbnail,
  user: $('Set fields1').item.json.user
}) }}

parameters.content:
## WasenderAPI Setup

**Quick Start:**
1. Sign up at [wasenderapi.com](https://wasenderapi.com)
2. Choose a plan ($6-$45)
3. Create session with your WhatsApp number
4. Scan QR code to connect
5. Enable webhook with `messages.received` event

**‚ö†Ô∏è Tip:** For new numbers, use manually for 7 days first to avoid detection.

## Set Fields Node

**Purpose:** Extracts and organizes WhatsApp message data

**Key Fields:**
- `message_id` - Unique message identifier
- `chat_id` - Conversation identifier  
- `content_type` - text/audio/image
- `content` - Message text/caption
- `timestamp` - Message date/time
- Media fields: `url`, `mimetype`, `mediaKey`, etc.

**Result:** Clean, structured data for processing

## Message Buffer System

**Flow:**
1. **Redis** - Stores messages in buffer
2. **Redis1** - Reads accumulated messages
3. **Switch** - Decides action:
   - Ignore duplicates
   - Continue if 7s elapsed
   - Wait if messages still arriving
4. **Wait3** - Pauses 7s for more messages
5. **Redis2** - Cleans buffer after processing

**Why?** Groups consecutive messages for smarter AI responses

**Redis Setup:** Free tier at [redis.io](https://redis.io)

## Message Processing

**Split Out** - Separates buffered messages into individual items

**Code** - Parses JSON messages safely with error handling

**Switch Type** - Routes by content:
- **Text** ‚Üí Direct processing
- **Audio** ‚Üí Transcription flow
- **Image** ‚Üí Vision analysis flow

**Result:** Each message type gets specialized handling

## Content Processing

**TEXT:** Extract content + timestamp

**AUDIO:**
1. Decrypt via WasenderAPI
2. Download file
3. Transcribe with OpenAI Whisper
4. Format as text

**IMAGE:**
1. Decrypt via WasenderAPI  
2. Analyze with GPT-4O Vision
3. Combine user caption + AI description

**OpenAI Setup:**
- Get API key at [platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com)
- Add payment method
- Costs: ~$0.006/min audio, ~$0.01/image

## AI Conversation System

**Aggregate** - Combines all processed messages

**Merge** - Joins data streams

**Chat Input** - Creates unified text from all content types

**AI Agent** - Processes with custom prompt

**OpenAI Model** - GPT-4.1-mini for responses

**Memory** - Remembers last 10 exchanges per chat

**Result:** Context-aware AI that handles text, audio & images

## Response Delivery

**Wait (6s)** - Critical anti-ban protection!
- Simulates human typing time
- Prevents instant bot detection
- Protects WhatsApp account

**Send Message** - Delivers AI response via WasenderAPI

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important:** 
- Never remove the wait
- 6-8s is optimal timing
- Instant responses = account suspension risk

## Change to Webhook Trigger
Replace manual trigger with webhook for production

user.name: Jose Bossa
user.bio: AI consultant with over 3 months and high ticket salesman over 2 years.
